column1: Dr. '''Bradley J. Birzer''' is an American scholar. He is the Amos Kirk Chair in history and director of American studies at [[wikipedia:Hillsdale_College
column2: Hillsdale College, Michigan]]. Though his main focus is American politics of the Jacksonian era, as well as the Civil War and the Indian Wars, he has published several articles and one book about [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], mainly focusing on Christianity.
